name: Item in DRAFT mode
subject_en: Your ad {{item_title}} , ID: {{item_id}} on {{portal_name}} is still just a draft. Do you want to put it live now?
subject_fi: Your ad {{item_title}} , ID: {{item_id}} on {{portal_name}} is still just a draft. Do you want to put it live now?
subject_en_GB: Your ad {{item_title}} , ID: {{item_id}} on {{portal_name}} is still just a draft. Do you want to put it live now?

subject_en: Wow, so many drafts! Do you want to put them live now?
subject_fi: Wow, so many drafts! Do you want to put them live now?
subject_en_GB: Wow, so many drafts! Do you want to put them live now?

name: Several Item expiry reminder
subject_en: Oh no, soo your ads are expiring..
subject_fi: Oh no, soo your ads are expiring..
subject_en_GB: Oh no, soo your ads are expiring..

name: User not logged in for a while (company user)
subject_en: It's been a while since you’ve been active on {{service}}
subject_fi: It's been a while since you’ve been active on {{service}}
subject_en_GB: It's been a while since you’ve been active on {{service}}
schedule_params: {"params":["not_logged_in_since_last_x_hours"],"params_value":["24"],"params_help":["User has not logged in since (x) hours"]}

name: User not logged in for a while (private user)
subject_en: It has been a while. Come visit {{service}} to discover new interesting items
subject_fi: It has been a while. Come visit {{service}} to discover new interesting items
subject_en_GB: It has been a while. Come visit {{service}} to discover new interesting items
schedule_params: {"params":["not_logged_in_since_last_x_hours"],"params_value":["24"],"params_help":["User has not logged in since (x) hours"]}

name: User hasn’t confirmed his/her email address
subject_en: Your {{service}} account is not yet confirmed.
subject_fi: Your {{service}} account is not yet confirmed.
subject_en_GB: Your {{service}} account is not yet confirmed.
schedule_params: {"params":["user_has_not_confirmed_in_x_hours"],"params_value":["168"],"params_help":["User has not confirmed his/her email address (x) hours"]}

name: User hasn’t placed any ads yet
subject_en: Get your stock out in the world! Place new ads on {{portal_name}}
subject_fi: Get your stock out in the world! Place new ads on {{portal_name}}
subject_en_GB: Get your stock out in the world! Place new ads on {{portal_name}}

name: User hasn’t placed any ads for a while
subject_en: We miss you. Place new ads on {{portal_name}}
subject_fi: We miss you. Place new ads on {{portal_name}}
subject_en_GB: We miss you. Place new ads on  {{portal_name}}
schedule_params: {"params":["user_has_not_placed_any_ads_in_last_x_hours"],"params_value":["168"],"params_help":["user has not placed any ads in last 168(X) hours"]}

name: Confirmation placing an ad
subject_en: Your ad “{{title}}” , ID: {{ID}} was placed successful on {{service}}.
subject_fi: Your ad “{{title}}” , ID: {{ID}} was placed successful on {{service}}.
subject_en_GB: Your ad “{{title}}” , ID: {{ID}} was placed successful on {{service}}.

name: Confirmation of subscription bought
subject_en: Congratulations, you are now a {{subscription_name}}-user on {{service}}
subject_fi: Congratulations, you are now a {{subscription_name}}-user on {{service}}
subject_en_GB: Congratulations, you are now a {{subscription_name}}-user on {{service}}

subject_en: Oh no, soo your ads expired.
subject_fi: Oh no, soo your ads expired.
subject_en_GB: Oh no, soo your ads expired.
